content.prompt: Which of the following illustrates an economic policy most likely supported by an ideologically liberal individual?

choices.label: The Federal Reserve increasing interest rates
Congress placing regulations on the marketplace by increasing the minimum wage
A bill that would decrease funding for the food stamp program
A state lowering income taxes to attract businesses

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
